document.discussion_title: Vivid Resourcing: Development Management Planning Officer
document.topic_text: Apply A Local Authority in East London is looking for a Planning Officer to join the Council's Development Management Team. The Authority is looking for a Planning Officer with a minimum of 1 years experience working in London for a local authority, desirable is a candidate who is looking to advance their career with a good opportunity working in a London Borough. These applications will typically be minor householder or commercial. Such as, small scale residential applications and commercial applications such as change of use and shop fronts, extensions and others. The role will be a 3 month rolling contract and will offer between £23-£28p/h depending on experience. This is an excellent opportunity to progress in your Planning career as there will be the potential to move onto larger projects. If you believe your skills and experience fit this role, please contact me on 0161 413 7290 or email me at james.willsher@vividresourcing.com.
